introduce.title: What is CopyWeb
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: CopyWeb is a powerful AI-powered code generator that transforms website designs into clean, production-ready code instantly.

items.title: URL to Code
items.description: Paste any website URL and get instant HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code that replicates the design.

items.title: Screenshot to Code
items.description: Upload a screenshot or design mockup and CopyWeb will generate pixel-perfect responsive code.

items.title: Figma to Code
items.description: Import your Figma designs directly and export production-ready React or HTML components.

items.title: Prompt to Code
items.description: Describe your desired website in plain text and let AI generate the complete code structure.

benefits.title: Why Choose CopyWeb
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: The fastest way to turn any website design into working code - completely free.

items.title: 100% Free Forever
items.description: No hidden costs, no credits system, no signup required. Generate unlimited code at zero cost.

items.title: Multiple Input Methods
items.description: Support URL, screenshot, Figma file, or text prompt - choose the method that works best for you.

items.title: Production-Ready Code
items.description: Get clean, semantic, responsive code that follows best practices and is ready to deploy.

usage.title: How to Use CopyWeb
usage.description: Generate code from any website design in three simple steps:

items.title: Choose Your Input
items.description: Select how you want to provide the design - paste a URL, upload a screenshot, import from Figma, or describe with text.

items.title: Generate Code
items.description: Click the generate button and let CopyWeb's AI analyze the design and produce clean, optimized code.

items.title: Customize Output
items.description: Choose your preferred framework (React, Vue, HTML/CSS) and customize the generated code as needed.

items.title: Download & Deploy
items.description: Copy the code or download as a project file. Your website is ready to deploy instantly.

items.title: Responsive Design
items.description: Generated code is fully responsive and works on all devices.

items.title: Clean Code Output
items.description: Semantic HTML, optimized CSS, and well-structured JavaScript.

items.title: Instant Preview
items.description: Preview your generated code in real-time before downloading.

items.title: No Signup Required
items.description: Start generating code immediately without creating an account.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About CopyWeb
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at support@copyweb.net

items.question: What is CopyWeb and how does it work?
items.answer: CopyWeb is an AI-powered code generator that converts website designs into clean, production-ready code. You can input a URL, upload a screenshot, import from Figma, or describe your design in text, and CopyWeb will generate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code instantly.

items.question: Is CopyWeb really free?
items.answer: Yes! CopyWeb is 100% free forever. There are no hidden costs, no credit system, and no signup required. You can generate unlimited code at zero cost.

items.question: What frameworks does CopyWeb support?
items.answer: CopyWeb supports multiple output formats including React, Vue, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and vanilla HTML/CSS. You can choose your preferred framework before generating code.

items.question: How accurate is the generated code?
items.answer: CopyWeb uses advanced AI to analyze designs and generate highly accurate, pixel-perfect code. The output is responsive, semantic, and follows modern web development best practices.

items.question: Can I use the generated code commercially?
items.answer: Absolutely! All code generated by CopyWeb is yours to use however you like - personal projects, client work, or commercial applications. No attribution required.

items.question: Do I need to create an account?
items.answer: No signup is required for basic usage. You can start generating code immediately. Creating an account unlocks additional features like saving projects and history.

cta.title: Turn Any Website Design Into Code
cta.description: Start generating production-ready code in seconds. 100% free, forever.
